Reaction module¶

For gread reaction you can use the Reaction module:

class Reaction.BlushingLevel¶

BlushingLevel child class is used for representing a blushing level reaction

Methods

check_conditions()

Check special conditions for blushing level reaction

check_conditions()¶

Check special conditions for blushing level reaction

class Reaction.HeartRate¶

Respiration child class is used for representing a heart rate reaction

class Reaction.PupillaryDilation¶

PupillaryDilation child class is used for representing a pupillary dilation reaction

Methods

check_conditions()

Check special conditions for pupillary dilation reaction

check_conditions()¶

Check special conditions for pupillary dilation reaction

class Reaction.Reaction¶

Reaction parent class is used for representing a reactions for children

Attributes

param int grade:

drade of reaction

param enum evaluated:

enum of Reactions

param bool is_valid:

flag for checking valid grade

param class ReactionException:

custom exception for Reaction class

Methods

grade_reaction()

Grades respondent's reaction

read_input()

Reads gave reaction

check_grade()

Checks that gave reaction is valid

check_conditions()

Check special conditions for concret reaction

exception ReactionException(message)¶

Custom exception for Reaction inherited from Exception

Attributes

Parameters:

message (string) -- exception message

check_conditions()¶

Check special conditions for concret reaction: implementing in children classes

check_grade()¶

Checks that gave reaction is valid

Raises:

Reaction.ReactionException -- if grade out of range

grade_reaction()¶

Grades respondent's reaction

read_input()¶

Reads gave reaction

Raises:

Reaction.ReactionException -- if invalid input

class Reaction.Reactions(value)¶

Reactions class is enum with different reactions

Attributes

Parameters:

  • DEFAULT (string) -- default

  • RESPIRATION (string) -- respiration

  • HEART_RATE (string) -- heart rate

  • BLUSHING_LEVEL (string) -- blushing level [1, 6]

  • PUPILLARY_DILATION (string) -- pupillary dilation [2, 8]

class Reaction.ReactionsCounter¶

ReactionsCounter class is counting grade reactions

Methods

update_reaction()

Regrade passing reaction

update_reaction(reaction: Reactions, update_sum: int)¶

Regrade passing reaction

Parameters:

  • reaction (class) -- changed reaction

  • update_sum (int) -- how much to increase changed reaction

class Reaction.Respiration¶

Respiration child class is used for representing a respiration reaction

Voight-Kampff test
